descriptionHtml:
Minnesota ENB is a cinematic/realistic ENB which is intended to look similar to the spring of Minnesota. The Enb is IMMERSIVE!!! because the province of skyrim the mid area of skyrim is similar to Minnesota. this mod uses Dark dungeons for enb (Thank you mindflux, you majestic being). 

to install this enb you need to download [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html]enbseries 305+ [/url]take the d3d9.dll and enbhost.exe out and put them in your skyrim directory

Then install my enb and place all files in skyrim directory. (if it asks you what you want to do with data folder, click replace files)

edit your skyrimprefs.ini.
set all these lines to.
bShadowsOnGrass=1 (you may actually have to add this line)
bDrawLandShadows=1
bTreesRecieveShadows=1
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1

I also tried bShadowsOnMoss=1 (i'm not even sure if it did anything, but I had to try, tell me if this changed anything)

My rig:
alienware 14 inch screen laptop
nvidia gtx 750 1gig of vram
1 terabyte hardrive
16 gigs of ram
average enb performance 30-35 fps

i know for a fact i didn't put my rig in correctly, but that's what i have
----------------------------------------
Mods in the screenshots
----------------------------------------
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73937/?]Vivid Weathers[/url] by mangaclub and kesta
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30450/?]Realistic Lighting Overhaul [/url]by The Realistic Lighting Team
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]Enhanced Lights And FX[/url] by anamorfus
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55555/?]RS Children Overhaul [/url]by Ranaline

[size=6]Hey, for any guys who may still keep track of this mod,[/size][size=5] [/size][size=6]my computer broke many months ago and i only just got my new (and more powerful) PC today. I'm going to be making more ENB's, [/size]
author: the whitest minnesotan ever
